EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Other_PH_Welcome to Pivotal_Q115.01 Welcome Email PH
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to Pivotal
You are receiving this email as you have interacted with us in some way either digitally or via registering or attending one of our events.
You can find out more about us on our website here: www.pivotal.io <http://www.pivotal.io/>
Our blog is regularly updated and you might like to subscribe: http://blog.pivotal.io/ <http://blog.pivotal.io/>
Pivotal will from time-to-time send you information that we hope you will find valuable.
If you are happy to continue to receive information from Pivotal you need not do anything.
To make sure we tailor the information to your interest, please edit your preferences here:
http://connect.pivotal.io/CommercialSubscription.html <http://connect.pivotal.io/CommercialSubscription.html>
